Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: This is a great game. I played a lot yesterday night with my gf (I had the chance to get the game early at my local store) and we had a blast. Beautiful graphics\, intense horror scene and the choices have real consequences. Since you can replay the game many times to have different ending\, I really recommend this to all the horror movie lovers.
